description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dt5iq","text":"This protocol details the mitochondrial antigen presentation (MitAP) to primary 2C CD8 T (proliferation and suppression) assay. {"blocks":[{"key":"4srrb","text":"Co-culture was performed in 10% FBS complete RPMI in 96-well round bottom plates for suspension cells (Sarstedt; Cat#83.3925.500) at a following ratio: 50,000 2C to 50,000 CD4 conv cells to 100,000 fixed BMDC.
